meaningMnemonic: Write down the <kanji>year</kanji>s of your <kanji>genealogy</kanji> in order and it makes a <vocabulary>chronological record</vocabulary> of your life. Look back on it when you're old and sigh about the old days.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
